name: Mozzarina

aura.name: milk_maker
aura.description: Sometimes produces Milk when assigned to ranch.

description: Milk pours from this Pal like water from an open faucet, regardless of its gender. It's truly a mystery of life, although this mystery may be better left unsolved.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: sand_blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: air_cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: stone_blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: stone_cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: power_bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
